item.title: Whats wrong with these scripts?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (objectID == 8987) { if(playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = 3315; teleportToY = 3386; inwildy = false; sendMessage("Mod "+playerName+" used the golden key to open the door."); sendMessage("If you do not have one, you might receive one now."); addItem(2944, 1); } else if(playerRights <= 1) { sendMessage("You must be a at least a player mod to enter!"); } }

Done.

item.title: Whats wrong with these scripts?
item.dc:creator: @Edmond Edmond
item.description:
@Edmond wrote:

the first one was fixed, but the second one still says has errors, it says:

client.java:17158: illegal start of expression
                                                   else if(playerRights) <= 1)

   ^
client.java:17162: ';' expected
                                                   }
                                                   ^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Whats wrong with these scripts?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

First:

// Mod House else if(useItemID == 2944 && atObjectX == 3185 && atObjectY == 3388) { if(playerRights >= 1) { ModHouse(); } else if(playerRights <= 1) { sendMessage("You need to have rights 1+ to get into the house!"); } } else if(useItemID == 85 && atObjectX == 3185 && atObjectY == 3388) { GoOut(); }

Second:

if (objectID == 8987) { if(playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = 3315; teleportToY = 3386; inwildy = false; sendMessage("Mod "+playerName+" used the golden key to open the door."); sendMessage("If you do not have one, you might receive one now."); addItem(2944, 1); } else if(playerRights) <= 1) { sendMessage("You must be a at least a player mod to enter!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Whats wrong with these scripts?
item.dc:creator: @Edmond Edmond
item.description:
@Edmond wrote:

when i did the

if (objectID == 8987) 
                                                   {
                                                   if(playerRights >= 1)
                                                   {
                                                             teleportToX = 3315;
		                                    teleportToY = 3386;
		                                    inwildy = false;
	                                                 sendMessage("Mod "+playerName+" used the golden key to open the door.");
	                                                 sendMessage("If you do not have one, you might receive one now.");
		                                    addItem(2944, 1);
                                                    }
                                                   else if(playerRights) <= 1)
                                                   {
                                                   sendMessage("You must be a at least a player mod to enter!");
                                                   }
                                                   }

it gave me these things:

client.java:14839: ')' expected
                                                                {
                                                                ^
client.java:14846: illegal start of expression
                                                                }
                                                                ^
client.java:17158: illegal start of expression
                                                   else if(playerRights) <= 1)

   ^
client.java:17162: ';' expected
                                                   }
                                                   ^
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

what now?
[br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2006, 04:50:30 PM[/size][hr]and teh first one is

                                                                // Mod House
				else if(useItemID == 2944 && (atObjectX == 3185 && atObjectY == 3388)) 
                                                                {
                                                                if(playerRights >= 1
                                                                {
				ModHouse();
				}
                                                                else if(playerRights) <= 1)

                                                                }
                                                                }
				else if(useItemID == 85 && (atObjectX == 3185 && atObjectY == 3388)) 
				{
				GoOut();
				}

item.title: Whats wrong with these scripts?
item.dc:creator: @Edmond Edmond
item.description:
@Edmond wrote:

My server is EdmondScape…
My problem is that everytime when I tried to insert mod house, it gives me errors, sometimes it gave me 35+ errors.
when I tried to fix my self, it gave me 100 errors

whats wrong with this script?

                                                                // Mod House
				else if(useItemID == 2944 && (atObjectX == 3185 && atObjectY == 3388)) 
                                                                {
                                                                if(playerRights >= 1
                                                                {
				ModHouse();
				}
                                                                else if(playerRights) <= 1)
                                                                {
                                                                sendMessage("You need to have rights 1++ to get into the house!");
                                                                }
                                                                }
				else if(useItemID == 85 && (atObjectX == 3185 && atObjectY == 3388)) 
				{
				GoOut();
				}

anyone know what’s wrong with it? it says it has 2 errors!

[hr]

ok, I have another script error, I also need help with it.

				if (objectID == 8987) 
                                                   {
                                                   if(playerRights >= 1
                                                   {
                                                             teleportToX = 3315;
		                                    teleportToY = 3386;
		                                    inwildy = false;
	                                                 sendMessage("Mod "+playerName+" , use the golden key will open the door");
	                                                 sendMessage("if you do not have one, you might receive one now..
		                                    addItem(2944, 1);
                                                    }
                                                   else if(playerRights) <= 1)
                                                   {
                                                   sendMessage("You must be a at least a player mod to enter!!");
                                                   }
                                                   }

reply me please for answers. I have 2 errors for this
I have total of 4 errors.

After I compiled it, it says…

client.java:14839: ')' expected
                                                                {
                                                                ^
client.java:14846: illegal start of expression
                                                                }
                                                                ^
client.java:17151: ')' expected
                                                   {
                                                   ^
client.java:17162: illegal start of expression
                                                   }
                                                   ^
4 errors
